This application was built to demonstrate web application development using:

  • Riot - an lightweight MVVM framework with custom tag support
  • Lupin - a lightweight flask-like toolkit for event and state management
  • Immutable - a library for tracking changes in application state

The application uses local browser storage to avoid incorporation of a proper database subsystem or REST back end. It is built in ES6 and translated using babel. It is packed into a single javaScript bundle with webpack.

To create a new task, enter the task text in the box. To mark a task complete, click on the task label.
